name: Chicken Fried Rice
story: 1-­‐2 sauteed chicken breasts cut up and marinated in soy sauce 4 c. scrambled eggs
ingredients: 1/2 onion chopped up and add to chicken once cooked, saute 1/2 cup butter
3/4 cup peas add to chicken and cook till soft 1-­‐2 garlic cloves
2 c. cooked white rice (add all items at the same time and mix)
